name: You and What Army
description: '''You and What Army''' were an English four-piece [[electronic rock]] band formed in 2007, originating from [[Telford]]. It consisted of [[Boyinaband|David Brown]] (vocals, synthesizers, sampling, turntables), Kieran Charles Smith (vocals, guitars), Jamie Hancox (bass, backing vocals) and Zak Hammond (drums, percussion) from 2008, and previously with Joseph Allen (guitar), Darren Smith (bass), and Thomas Bridgwater (drums). Although they are predominantly a rock band, they combine several different musical styles into their sound and are mainly influenced by [[Heavy metal music|heavy metal]] and [[electronic music]].
